00061 struct tg_export_data {
00064         struct mutex            ted_lcd_lock;
00066         struct lsd_client_data  *ted_lcd;
00068         loff_t                  ted_lr_off;
00070         int                     ted_lr_idx;
00071 
00073         struct lu_nodemap       *ted_nodemap;
00074         struct list_head        ted_nodemap_member;
00075 
00076         /* Every reply data fields below are
00077          * protected by ted_lcd_lock */
00079         struct list_head        ted_reply_list;
00080         int                     ted_reply_cnt;
00082         struct tg_reply_data    *ted_reply_last;
00083         /* Statistics */
00084         int                     ted_reply_max; /* high water mark */
00085         int                     ted_release_xid;
00086         int                     ted_release_tag;
00087 };

00092 struct mdt_export_data {
00093         struct tg_export_data   med_ted;
00095         struct list_head        med_open_head;
00096         spinlock_t              med_open_lock; /* med_open_head, mfd_list */
00097         struct mutex            med_idmap_mutex;
00098         struct lustre_idmap_table *med_idmap;
00099 };

00105 /* In-memory access to client data from OST struct */
00107 struct filter_export_data {
00108         struct tg_export_data   fed_ted;
00109         spinlock_t              fed_lock;       
00110         __u64                   fed_lastid_gen;
00111         long                    fed_dirty;    /* in bytes */
00112         long                    fed_grant;    /* in bytes */
00113         struct list_head        fed_mod_list; /* files being modified */
00114         long                    fed_pending;  /* bytes just being written */
00115         /* count of SOFT_SYNC RPCs, which will be reset after
00116          * ofd_soft_sync_limit number of RPCs, and trigger a sync. */
00117         atomic_t                fed_soft_sync_count;
00118         int                     fed_mod_count;/* items in fed_writing list */
00119         __u32                   fed_group;
00120         __u8                    fed_pagebits; /* log2 of client page size */
00121 };

00123 struct mgs_export_data {
00124         struct list_head        med_clients;    /* mgc fs client via this exp */
00125         spinlock_t              med_lock;       /* protect med_clients */
00126 };

00132 struct nid_stat {
00133         lnet_nid_t               nid;
00134         struct hlist_node        nid_hash;
00135         struct list_head         nid_list;
00136         struct obd_device       *nid_obd;
00137         struct proc_dir_entry   *nid_proc;
00138         struct lprocfs_stats    *nid_stats;
00139         struct lprocfs_stats    *nid_ldlm_stats;
00140         atomic_t                 nid_exp_ref_count; /* for obd_nid_stats_hash
00141                                                        exp_nid_stats */
00142 };
00143 
00144 #define nidstat_getref(nidstat)                                                \
00145 do {                                                                           \
00146         atomic_inc(&(nidstat)->nid_exp_ref_count);                         \
00147 } while(0)
00148 
00149 #define nidstat_putref(nidstat)                                                \
00150 do {                                                                           \
00151         atomic_dec(&(nidstat)->nid_exp_ref_count);                         \
00152         LASSERTF(atomic_read(&(nidstat)->nid_exp_ref_count) >= 0,          \
00153                  "stat %p nid_exp_ref_count < 0\n", nidstat);                  \
00154 } while(0)
00155 
00156 enum obd_option {
00157         OBD_OPT_FORCE =         0x0001,
00158         OBD_OPT_FAILOVER =      0x0002,
00159         OBD_OPT_ABORT_RECOV =   0x0004,
00160 };
00161 
00169 struct obd_export {
00175         struct portals_handle   exp_handle;
00176         atomic_t                exp_refcount;
00183         atomic_t                exp_rpc_count; /* RPC references */
00184         atomic_t                exp_cb_count; /* Commit callback references */
00186         atomic_t                exp_replay_count;
00187         atomic_t                exp_locks_count; 
00188 #if LUSTRE_TRACKS_LOCK_EXP_REFS
00189         struct list_head        exp_locks_list;
00190         spinlock_t              exp_locks_list_guard;
00191 #endif
00192 
00193         struct obd_uuid         exp_client_uuid;
00195         struct list_head        exp_obd_chain;
00196         /* Unlinked export list */
00197         struct list_head        exp_stale_list;
00198         struct hlist_node       exp_uuid_hash;  
00199         struct hlist_node       exp_nid_hash;   
00200         struct hlist_node       exp_gen_hash;   
00207         struct list_head        exp_obd_chain_timed;
00209         struct obd_device      *exp_obd;
00214         struct obd_import        *exp_imp_reverse;
00215         struct nid_stat          *exp_nid_stats;
00217         struct ptlrpc_connection *exp_connection;
00219         __u32                     exp_conn_cnt;
00221         struct cfs_hash          *exp_lock_hash;
00226         struct cfs_hash        *exp_flock_hash;
00227         struct list_head        exp_outstanding_replies;
00228         struct list_head        exp_uncommitted_replies;
00229         spinlock_t              exp_uncommitted_replies_lock;
00231         __u64                   exp_last_committed;
00233         cfs_time_t              exp_last_request_time;
00235         struct list_head        exp_req_replay_queue;
00240         spinlock_t                exp_lock;
00243         struct obd_connect_data   exp_connect_data;
00244         enum obd_option           exp_flags;
00245         unsigned long             exp_failed:1,
00246                                   exp_in_recovery:1,
00247                                   exp_disconnected:1,
00248                                   exp_connecting:1,
00250                                   exp_delayed:1,
00252                                   exp_vbr_failed:1,
00253                                   exp_req_replay_needed:1,
00254                                   exp_lock_replay_needed:1,
00255                                   exp_need_sync:1,
00256                                   exp_flvr_changed:1,
00257                                   exp_flvr_adapt:1,
00258                                   exp_libclient:1, /* liblustre client? */
00259                                   /* if to swap nidtbl entries for 2.2 clients.
00260                                    * Only used by the MGS to fix LU-1644. */
00261                                   exp_need_mne_swab:1;
00262         /* also protected by exp_lock */
00263         enum lustre_sec_part      exp_sp_peer;
00264         struct sptlrpc_flavor     exp_flvr;             /* current */
00265         struct sptlrpc_flavor     exp_flvr_old[2];      /* about-to-expire */
00266         cfs_time_t                exp_flvr_expire[2];   /* seconds */
00267 
00269         spinlock_t              exp_rpc_lock;
00270         struct list_head        exp_hp_rpcs;    /* (potential) HP RPCs */
00271         struct list_head        exp_reg_rpcs;  /* RPC being handled */
00272 
00274         struct list_head        exp_bl_list;
00275         spinlock_t              exp_bl_list_lock;
00276 
00278         union {
00279                 struct tg_export_data     eu_target_data;
00280                 struct mdt_export_data    eu_mdt_data;
00281                 struct filter_export_data eu_filter_data;
00282                 struct ec_export_data     eu_ec_data;
00283                 struct mgs_export_data    eu_mgs_data;
00284         } u;
00285 
00286         struct adaptive_timeout    exp_bl_lock_at;
00287 
00291         __u64                     exp_last_xid;
00292 };
00293 
00294 #define exp_target_data u.eu_target_data
00295 #define exp_mdt_data    u.eu_mdt_data
00296 #define exp_filter_data u.eu_filter_data
00297 #define exp_ec_data     u.eu_ec_data

00299 static inline __u64 *exp_connect_flags_ptr(struct obd_export *exp)
00300 {
00301         return &exp->exp_connect_data.ocd_connect_flags;
00302 }
00303 
00304 static inline __u64 exp_connect_flags(struct obd_export *exp)
00305 {
00306         return *exp_connect_flags_ptr(exp);
00307 }
00308 
00309 static inline int exp_max_brw_size(struct obd_export *exp)
00310 {
00311         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00312         if (exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_BRW_SIZE)
00313                 return exp->exp_connect_data.ocd_brw_size;
00314 
00315         return ONE_MB_BRW_SIZE;
00316 }
00317 
00318 static inline int exp_connect_multibulk(struct obd_export *exp)
00319 {
00320         return exp_max_brw_size(exp) > ONE_MB_BRW_SIZE;
00321 }
00322 
00323 static inline int exp_expired(struct obd_export *exp, cfs_duration_t age)
00324 {
00325         LASSERT(exp->exp_delayed);
00326         return cfs_time_before(cfs_time_add(exp->exp_last_request_time, age),
00327                                cfs_time_current_sec());
00328 }
00329 
00330 static inline int exp_connect_cancelset(struct obd_export *exp)
00331 {
00332         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00333         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_CANCELSET);
00334 }
00335 
00336 static inline int exp_connect_lru_resize(struct obd_export *exp)
00337 {
00338         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00339         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_LRU_RESIZE);
00340 }
00341 
00342 static inline int exp_connect_rmtclient(struct obd_export *exp)
00343 {
00344         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00345         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_RMT_CLIENT);
00346 }
00347 
00348 static inline int client_is_remote(struct obd_export *exp)
00349 {
00350         struct obd_import *imp = class_exp2cliimp(exp);
00351 
00352         return !!(imp->imp_connect_data.ocd_connect_flags &
00353                   OBD_CONNECT_RMT_CLIENT);
00354 }
00355 
00356 static inline int exp_connect_vbr(struct obd_export *exp)
00357 {
00358         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00359         LASSERT(exp->exp_connection);
00360         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_VBR);
00361 }
00362 
00363 static inline int exp_connect_umask(struct obd_export *exp)
00364 {
00365         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_UMASK);
00366 }
00367 
00368 static inline int imp_connect_lru_resize(struct obd_import *imp)
00369 {
00370         struct obd_connect_data *ocd;
00371 
00372         LASSERT(imp != NULL);
00373         ocd = &imp->imp_connect_data;
00374         return !!(ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_LRU_RESIZE);
00375 }
00376 
00377 static inline int exp_connect_layout(struct obd_export *exp)
00378 {
00379         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_LAYOUTLOCK);
00380 }
00381 
00382 static inline bool exp_connect_lvb_type(struct obd_export *exp)
00383 {
00384         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
00385         if (exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_LVB_TYPE)
00386                 return true;
00387         else
00388                 return false;
00389 }
00390 
00391 static inline bool imp_connect_lvb_type(struct obd_import *imp)
00392 {
00393         struct obd_connect_data *ocd;
00394 
00395         LASSERT(imp != NULL);
00396         ocd = &imp->imp_connect_data;
00397         if (ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_LVB_TYPE)
00398                 return true;
00399         else
00400                 return false;
00401 }
00402 
00403 static inline bool imp_connect_disp_stripe(struct obd_import *imp)
00404 {
00405         struct obd_connect_data *ocd;
00406 
00407         LASSERT(imp != NULL);
00408         ocd = &imp->imp_connect_data;
00409         return ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_DISP_STRIPE;
00410 }
00411 
00412 static inline __u64 exp_connect_ibits(struct obd_export *exp)
00413 {
00414         struct obd_connect_data *ocd;
00415 
00416         ocd = &exp->exp_connect_data;
00417         return ocd->ocd_ibits_known;
00418 }

00420 extern struct obd_export *class_conn2export(struct lustre_handle *conn);
00421 extern struct obd_device *class_conn2obd(struct lustre_handle *conn);
